item.title: By: Matt White

item.description: <p>It was two photos taken last Saturday (3rd March) and then stitched together using DoubleTake (a photo app for the Mac).<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
It was two photos taken last Saturday (3rd March) and then stitched together using DoubleTake (a photo app for the Mac).

Matt
